TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MenuMerge extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the behavior of a when it is merged with items in another menu.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
## Examples The following example uses this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> and merge it with another. The merged <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is then added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control. This example assumes that there are two menu items called `menuItem1` and `menuItem2` that contain submenu items within them and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> named `contextMenu1` to display the menu items. `menuItem1` and `menuItem2` have different menu items contained within them. After the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A> is made, a consolidated menu is created.
[!code-vb[Classic MenuItem.MergeMenu1 Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.m_14_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Classic MenuItem.MergeMenu1 Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.m_14_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[Classic MenuItem.MergeMenu1 Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.m_14_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.MenuMerge Add = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The is added to the collection of existing objects in a merged menu.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.MenuMerge MergeItems = int32(2)

Docs.summary: All submenu items of this are merged with those of existing objects at the same position in a merged menu.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.MenuMerge Remove = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The is not included in a merged menu.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.MenuMerge Replace = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The replaces an existing at the same position in a merged menu.
